name: Covertly Overthrowing PSN-Controlled Systems
description: A tactical approach to dismantling systems under PSN control through stealth, infiltration, and strategic subversion.
focus: Forcing Structural Collapse Without Direct Conflict

cards.title: Strategic Infiltration and Subversion
cards.description: Embedding operatives within PSN-controlled systems to neutralize threats from within.
bulletpoints: Gaining insider status allows for the quiet dismantling of their operational structures.
Using sleeper agents to gradually shift policies disrupts long-term objectives.
Planting ideological subversion in their ranks weakens systemic loyalty.
cards.summaryText: Slide trusted assets inside, bend policy from within, and erode loyalty cell by cell.

cards.title: Economic and Bureaucratic Sabotage
cards.description: Using financial and administrative warfare to dismantle PSN-controlled institutions.
bulletpoints: Deliberately exposing financial irregularities triggers external scrutiny.
Blocking legal loopholes removes their ability to operate under the radar.
Destroying their funding mechanisms causes structural collapse.
cards.summaryText: Expose the money trail, seal loopholes, and starve their operations into collapse.

cards.title: Hijacking Their Narrative Control
cards.description: Using media, social networks, and alternative platforms to discredit PSN propaganda.
bulletpoints: Amplifying counter-narratives drowns out their psychological influence.
Using humor and ridicule weakens their perceived authority.
Revealing classified PSN operations forces them into damage control.
cards.summaryText: Flood channels with counter-stories, satire, and leaks until their narrative crumbles.
